remarks: There is a single point in ` ( A (,] B ) ` that's distant from ` X ` a multiple integer of ` T ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem35.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem35.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem35.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem35.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem35.5 $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem35.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ZZ ) $.
fourierdlem35.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ZZ ) $.
fourierdlem35.iel $e |- ( ph -> ( X + ( I x. T ) ) e. ( A (,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem35.jel $e |- ( ph -> ( X + ( J x. T ) ) e. ( A (,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem35 $p |- ( ph -> I = J ) $.
